availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Melvina Fryer Lancaster. Father of Thomas Lancaster, Ella J Lancaster, Horace Lancaster, Flora B Lancaster, William Lancaster and Elizabeth Lancaster. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Pendleton County Marriages, Film #272807, p. 270.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, p. 627.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Precinct 4, p. 457A.
Find A Grave, "Ruben Lancaster (1828-1893)," Memorial #81532134, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/81532134 (accessed September 18, 2019).
